sentence.Network_en: The side tracks off the tarred road were rutted and uneven.
sentence.Network_cn: 柏油路面两边的辅道上布满车辙，凹凸不平。

sentence.Network_en: He staggered on the uneven surface of the car park.
sentence.Network_cn: 他摇摇晃晃地行走在停车场凹凸不平的地面上。

sentence.Network_en: The growth of home ownership has been both socially and spatially uneven.
sentence.Network_cn: 住宅拥有人数的增长在社会阶层和地域上分布不均。

1. uneven in developmentuneven distribution 不均匀分布unexceptional 平常的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English unefen 'not corresponding exactly' (see un-, even)

entry.tran: 不平坦的;不平滑的;凹凸不平的;参差不齐的
entry.def: An uneven surface or edge is not smooth, flat, or straight.

example.ex: He staggered on the uneven surface of the car park...
example.tran: 他摇摇晃晃地行走在停车场凹凸不平的地面上。

example.ex: She gazed round the church at the grey uneven walls and the vivid stained glass windows.
example.tran: 她四下打量了一番教堂凹凸不平的灰色墙壁和色彩鲜艳的彩色玻璃窗。

entry.def: Something that is uneven is not regular or consistent.

example.ex: He could hear that her breathing was uneven...
example.tran: 他能听到她的呼吸不均匀。

example.ex: What kids experience now is an uneven rate of development. They are forced to be older than their years.
example.tran: 小孩子现在的问题是成长速度不均衡。他们被迫变得比自己的实际年龄老成。

entry.def: If you describe something as uneven, you think it is not very good because it is not consistent in quality.

example.ex: This was, for him, an oddly uneven performance...
example.tran: 对他而言，这场演出时好时坏，很是奇怪。

entry.def: An uneven system or situation is unfairly arranged or organized.

example.ex: Some of the victims are complaining loudly about the uneven distribution of emergency aid...
example.tran: 其中一些灾民大声地抱怨紧急援助物资分配不公。
这是一场不公平的竞赛。

means.word_mean: 1. not even or uniform as e.g. in shape or texture;
2. (of a contest or contestants) not fairly matched as opponents;

sentences.sentence: "vaudeville...waged an uneven battle against the church"

auth_sentence.content: Uneven tanning when in the sun or using sunbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Uneven tanning when in the sun or using sunbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Uneven tanning when in the sun or using sunbed.

auth_sentence.content: Never mind the uneven bars or the long jump.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never mind the uneven bars or the long jump.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never mind the uneven bars or the long jump.

auth_sentence.content: But recovery will be uneven across countries and sectors.
auth_sentence.res_content: But recovery will be uneven across countries and sectors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But recovery will be uneven across countries and sectors.

Sentence.sentence: This type of uneven distribution is not peculiar to the UK and is mirrored across other economies.

means.word_mean: 不平坦的;不平滑的;不规则的;凹凸不平的

sentences.en: The sidewalk is very uneven—be careful where you walk.
sentences.cn: 这人行道凹凸不平——走路时请小心。

means.word_mean: 不一致的;不相等的;有差异的

sentences.en: Her works have been rather uneven this year.
sentences.cn: 她今年的作品相当参差不齐。
